description:
Part A: Manana and Chio talk about what kind of situation they’d like to be in before they die.
Part B: Chio and Manana discuss the career survey path they were given.
Part C: Manana tells Chio how she would’ve dealt with her awkward meeting with Yuki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Smoke on the Sailor / Die Kirschblüte in der Hand
Smoke on the Sailor / Sakura no Hana o Te ni Totte / Manana-chan no Tsuugakuro
Smoke on the Sailor / Taking the Cherry Blossom in Your Hand / Manana`s School Road
Smoking Chio / Le boulot d’Andô / Manana’s School Road
スモーク・オン・ザ・セーラー / 桜の花を手にとって / まななちゃんの通学路
